text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium bovifimosum is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from dry cow manure in Wyoming in the United States.
text.Further reading: Tuthill, Dorothy E.; Frisvad, Jens C. (2002). "Eupenicillium bovifimosum, a new species from dry cow manure in Wyoming". Mycologia. 94 (2): 240–6. doi:10.1080/15572536.2003.11833229. PMID 21156493.
